nodes.text: The Telkur Station Cantina was a seedy pirate cantina on the Telkur Station.

The cantina was a place illuminated by dim blue lightning and filled with the sweet taint of Rekka smoke hanging in the air. The discreet entrance was half-concealed somewhere along the establishment's eight walls. The room's only ceiling was a disorganized web of ventilation ducts.

The place featured a filthy bar whose Hapan barkeepers handed out datapads with drink recipes featuring beverages like the Red Cloud and the flat-tasting Gizer Ale which was both served in mugs to guests.

The Cantina's clients were exclusively Human and Near-Human who sat clustered in groups of three or four together around corroded, rust-stained durasteel-tables. The male patrons were handsome but scroungy looking with three-day beards whereas the Hapan women dressed to look tough and available. The pirate station used to be a prominent hotspot for outlawed ships to pick up on supplies because the place was not on the radar of Hapan Security.
Although it was allowed to bring in weapons, droids had to stay outside. The cantina also refrained from using any bartending or surveillance droids for business.
